lead_paragraph: YOSPIN--Tobias, of Roslyn, NY, Brooklyn born and bred, on December 31, 2015, at age 96. Beloved husband of the late Audrey (Kreinik) Yospin. Loving father of Richard Yospin, and the late Marjorie Yospin Newman. Adoring grandfather of Matthew, Gabriel and Sarina Yospin, and Eric and David Newman. Dear brother of Elaine Melnikoff and Thelma Kanig. Graduate of City College, and NYU Dental School; emeritus professor, City University of New York; painter and sculptor; lifetime tennis player, golfer and swimmer; passionate classical music listener; together with Audrey, world traveler. Graveside services at Beth Moses Cemetery, 1500 Wellwood Ave., West Babylon, NY 11704, on Monday, January 4 at 1pm. Memorial Observance at the home of Joan and Richard Yospin, Wednesday, January 6, 2016. In lieu of flowers, remembrances may be made to: the Yiddish Book Center, 1021 West Street, Amherst, MA 01002. Levine Chapels, Brookline, 617-277-8300. www.levine chapel.com 1/3
